channel.title: 4 Things You Never Knew About Judaism: Classic Sinai Podcast
channel.itunes:description: Jewish audio mp3s for the curious mind.
channel.itunes:author: Lori Palatnik
channel.description: Upgrade your Sunday School conception of what it means to be Jewish. You may be pleasantly surprised at how much Judaism can offer you in terms of personality development.
